creditline: Gift of James C. and Kathryn L. Hogan
description: recto: black silhouettes of woman wearing a bonnet holding a switch trailing five geese, with grey silhouettes of trees in background; verso: central sketch of a cottage perched on a mushroom surrounded by other mushrooms; figure and facial studies in margins of fantastic and grotesque figures and old men, with skull at top center
medium: Pen and ink and wash and graphite on card
provenance: The artist; his stepson, Jim Hogan, Hudson, WI.
title: Untitled [silhouette of old woman and five geese, recto; mushroom cottage and fantastic figure studies, verso]
